evidence.claim: AssuranceSD utilizes AWS for its infrastructure needs, ensuring scalability and reliability.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations, demonstrating its commitment to health information security.
Integration patterns including Kafka are documented in the developer section, showcasing real-time data processing capabilities.
AssuranceSD mentions data exchange formats including FHIR and X12 in its health tech documentation.
AssuranceSD employs Snowflake for its data warehousing solutions, enhancing data management and analytics.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in health tech with focus on X12 standards and API integrations.
